• Video:
{\afs18 use the Philips SPC500NC/SPC505NC WebCam for video chatting and video calling.The WebCam works with Skype,Windows}{\afs14 ® }{\afs18 Live Messenger,Yahoo!}

{\afs18\f4 使用}{\f2\afs18 Philips SPC500NC/SPC505NC }{\afs18\f4 网络摄像头实现视频聊天和视频电话。该网络摄像头可用于}{\f2\afs18 Skype}{\afs18\f4 、}{\f2\afs18 Windows}{\f2\afs14 ® }{\f2\afs18 Live Messenger}{\afs18\f4 、}{\f2\afs18 Yahoo!}
Messenger, AOL Messenger, QQ and other free instant messenging and VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) services;
{\f2 Messenger}{\f4 、}{\f2 AOL Messenger}{\f4 、}{\f2 QQ }{\f4 以及其他免费即时消息和}{\f2 VoIP}{\f4 （基于互联网协议的语音）服务；}

{\afs18\cf18 The software supplied only works on PCs with the operating systems }{\afs18\cf17 Microsoft}{\afs14\cf17 ® }{\afs18\cf17 Windows}{\afs14\cf17 ® }{\afs18\cf17 98SE, ME, 2000, XP and Vista.}

{\afs18\cf18\f4 随附的软件只可用于安装了}{\f2\afs18\cf18 }{\f2\afs18\cf17 Microsoft}{\f2\afs14\cf17 ® }{\f2\afs18\cf17 Windows}{\f2\afs14\cf17 ® }{\f2\afs18\cf17 98SE}{\afs18\cf17\f4 、}{\f2\afs18\cf17 ME}{\afs18\cf17\f4 、}{\f2\afs18\cf17 2000}{\afs18\cf17\f4 、}{\f2\afs18\cf17 XP }{\afs18\cf17\f4 和}{\f2\afs18\cf17 Vista }{\afs18\cf18\f4 操作系统的}{\f2\afs18\cf18 PC}{\afs18\cf18\f4 。}
> After a couple of seconds the ‘Welcome’ screen appears, followed by the ‘Language selection’ screen.
{\f2 > }{\f4 几秒钟后将显示“欢迎”}{\f2 (Welcome) }{\f4 画面，之后会显示“语言选择”}{\f2 (Language selection) }{\f4 画面。}

{\afs18\cf18\i If the }{\afs18\cf17\i 'Welcome' }{\afs18\cf18\i screen does not appear automatically, open the Microsoft}{\afs14\cf18 ®}{\afs18\cf18\i Windows}{\afs14\cf18 ® }{\afs18\cf18\i Explorer and double click on the 'Set-up.exe' icon in the CD-ROM directory.}

After you read or printed the user manual, continue installation by selecting the second option.

•{\cf18 Connect the }{\cf17 grey }{\cf18 headphone plug (n) to the headphone socket of the PC sound card.}
•{\f2\cf18 }{\cf18\f4 将}{\cf17\f4 灰色}{\cf18\f4 耳机插头}{\f2\cf18 (n) }{\cf18\f4 连接至}{\f2\cf18 PC }{\cf18\f4 声卡的耳机插孔。}

• If desired, attach the foam pads to the earphones for more listening comfort.
•{\f2 }{\f4 如果需要，也可以将听筒套上泡沫耳垫，以便更加舒适。}
• If desired, click the audio cable into the shirt clip and attach the clip to your shirt.
•{\f2 }{\f4 如果需要，也可以将音频缆线卡入衣领夹，再将衣领夹固定在您的衣服上。}
The Philips SPC500NC/SPC505NC video properties can be changed:
{\f4 可通过以下方式改变}{\f2 Philips SPC500NC/SPC505NC }{\f4 的视频属性：}
- from within an application;
—{\f2 }{\f4 从应用程序中改变：}
- by clicking the WebCam Video Viewer icon in the Windows taskbar, bottom right of your screen, or
—{\f2 }{\f4 通过单击屏幕右下角}{\f2 Windows }{\f4 任务栏中的网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer) }{\f4 图标，或}
- by selecting ‘Advance’ in the WebCam Video Viewer.
—{\f2 }{\f4 通过选择网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer) }{\f4 中的“高级”}{\f2 (Advance)}{\f4 。}
See ‘Operating the WebCam.
{\f2 16 }{\cf17\f4 参见“网络摄像头的操作”。}
Operating the WebCam
ÍøÂçÉãÏñÍ·µÄ²Ù×÷
WebCam Video Viewer
{\f4 网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer)}

All WebCam applications can be accessed via the WebCam Video Viewer.The WebCam Video Viewer is the central application for easy access to your Philips WebCam and all image and video applications installed during setup.
{\f4 所有网络摄像头应用程序都可通过网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer) }{\f4 来访问。网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer) }{\f4 是一个中心应用程序，您可通过它轻松访问}{\f2 Philips }{\f4 网络摄像头以及在设置过程中安装的所有图像和视频应用程序。}
• Start the WebCam Video Viewer:
•{\f2 }{\f4 可通过以下方式启动网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer)}{\f4 ：}
- through the Windows QuickLaunch menu in your taskbar,
—{\f2 }{\f4 通过任务栏中的}{\f2 Windows }{\f4 快速启动菜单，}
- via the program group ‘SPC500NC WebCam’, or
—{\f2 }{\f4 通过“}{\f2 SPC500NC }{\f4 网络摄像头”程序组，或}
- by clicking the the WebCam Video Viewer icon on the desktop.
—{\f2 }{\f4 通过单击桌面上的网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer) }{\f4 图标。}
> The WebCam Video Viewer will now be initiated and the WebCam Video Viewer selection screen appears.
{\f2 > }{\f4 此时将初始化网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer)}{\f4 ，然后会出现网络摄像头视频查看器}{\f2 (WebCam Video Viewer) }{\f4 的选择画面。}
• Select ‘{\b Format}’ if you wish to adjust the video format:
•{\f2 }{\f4 如果您想要调整视频格式，请选择“}{\f4\b 格式}{\f4 ”}{\f2 (}{\f2\b Format}{\f2 )}{\f4 ：}
> The ‘Properties’ screen appears.
{\f2 > }{\f4 出现“属性”}{\f2 (Properties) }{\f4 画面。}
- Frame Rate (30,000):
the number of frames displayed per second.The higher the frame rate, the better the video quality.
Ã¿ÃëÏÔÊ¾µÄÖ¡Êý¡£Ö¡ÂÊÔ½¸ß£¬Í¼ÏñÖÊÁ¿Ô½ºÃ¡£
- Color Space (RGB 24) / Compression (1420):
Compression 1420 reduces the quantity of data used to show video content without excessively reducing the picture quality.
{\f4 色彩压缩}{\f2 1420 }{\f4 减少了用于显示视频内容的数据量，但又不会明显降低图片质量。}
Compressed video files are easier to store and transmit than non-compressed video files.

Select this option for Internet applications.
ÔÚÊ¹ÓÃ»¥ÁªÍøÓ¦ÓÃ³ÌÐòÊ±£¬¿ÉÑ¡Ôñ´ËÑ¡Ïî¡£
Operating the camera
{\f2 16 }{\f4 摄像头的操作}
Color space is a representation of the amount of color gradations the WebCam is able to capture, expressed in bits per pixel (individual point of color).
{\f4 色彩空间代表了网络摄像头能捕获的色彩层次的量，单位为“位}{\f2 /}{\f4 像素”（颜色的每个点）。}

RGB24, also known as Truecolor, refers to 8 bit per color component (Red, Green, Blue), resluting in 24 bits per pixel.This modes makes it possible to represent 256 gradations of each color component.
{\f2 RGB24}{\f4 （即“真彩色”）指每种色彩元素（红、绿、篮）占用}{\f2 8 }{\f4 位，因此，每个像素便占用}{\f2 24 }{\f4 位。通过这种模式，可以将每种色彩元素以}{\f2 256 }{\f4 个层次表现出来。}
Select this option for non-Internet applications.
Ê¹ÓÃ·Ç»¥ÁªÍøÓ¦ÓÃ³ÌÐòÊ±£¬¿ÉÑ¡Ôñ´ËÑ¡Ïî¡£
- Output size (resolution):
—{\f2 }{\f4 输出大小（分辨率）：}

Resolution is the number of pixels (individual points of color) on both horizontal and vertical axis of a monitor.The sharpness of the displayed image depends on the resolution and the size of the monitor.The higher the output size, the higher the resolution (and sharpness) of the displayed image.

• Select ‘{\b Advance}’ to access the WebCam settings.
•{\f2 }{\f4 选择“}{\f4\b 高级}{\f4 ”}{\f2 (}{\f2\b Advance}{\f2 )}{\f4 ，进入网络摄像头设置}{\f2 (WebCam settings) }{\f4 界面。}

{\f4 参见“网络摄像头设置”}{\f2 (WebCam settings)}{\f4 。}
• Check the ‘{\b Capture Audio}’ box if you wish to capture your voice as well during video recording.
•{\f2 }{\f4 如果您希望在录像过程中捕获声音，请勾选“}{\f4\b 捕获音频}{\f4 ”}{\f2 (}{\f2\b Capture Audio}{\f2 ) }{\f4 复选框。}
Making a video recording
Â¼ÖÆÊÓÆµ
{\b 1 }Select ‘{\b Record}’.
{\b 2 }Select a folder to store the recording in.
{\f2 2 }{\f4 选择用来存储录像文件的文件夹。}
> Recording starts immediately.
{\f2 > }{\f4 录制便会立即开始。}
> Elapsed playing time, file size and free disk space are shown.
{\f2 > }{\f4 显示已播放的时间、文件大小和可用磁盘空间。}
• Select ‘{\b Stop}’ to stop recording.
• Select ‘{\b Playback}’ to play the recording.
•{\f2 }{\f4 选择“}{\f4\b 重放}{\f4 ”}{\f2 (}{\f2\b Playback}{\f2 ) }{\f4 可播放录制的视频。}
Instant messenging and Internet calling
¼´Ê±ÏûÏ¢ºÍÍøÂçµç»°
(video chatting, video calling and VoIP)
{\f2 (}{\f4 视频聊天、视频电话和}{\f2 VoIP)}

{\afs18 The Philips SPC500NC/SPC505NC WebCam works with }{\afs18\i all }{\afs18 free instant messenging and VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) applications such as Skype,Windows}{\afs14 ® }{\afs18 Live Messenger,Yahoo!}

{\f2\afs18 Philips SPC500NC/SPC505NC }{\afs18\f4 网络摄像头可用于}{\afs18\f4\i 所有}{\afs18\f4 免费的即时消息和}{\f2\afs18 VoIP }{\afs18\f4 （基于互联网协议的语音）应用程序，如}{\f2\afs18 Skype}{\afs18\f4 、}{\f2\afs18 Windows}{\f2\afs14 ® }{\f2\afs18 Live Messenger}{\afs18\f4 、}{\f2\afs18 Yahoo!}
Messenger,AOL Messenger and QQ.
{\f2 Messenger}{\f4 、}{\f2 AOL Messenger }{\f4 和}{\f2 QQ}{\f4 。}
• Download and install the desired applications via their websites.
•{\f2 }{\f4 通过各自的网站下载并安装所需应用程序。}
• Follow the on-screen instructions during downloading and installing.
•{\f2 }{\f4 按照屏幕显示说明下载并安装软件。}
• After installing an application, make the required WebCam settings {\i within }the application in order to be able to properly use the WebCam via the application.
•{\f2 }{\f4 安装应用程序后，为了能通过应用程序正确地使用网络摄像头，应在应用程序中进行必要的设置。}

Features settings
功能设置
Grey microphone plug (!) - for connecting to the headphone or green socket of the PC sound card.
{\cf14 灰色麦克风插头 }{\f5 (!)}{\cf14\f2 - }{\cf14 用于连接}{\cf14\f2 PC }{\cf14 声卡上的耳机插孔或绿色插孔。}
Audio cable (SPC525NC only)
音频缆线（仅{\f5 SPC525NC}）
Black headphone plug (n)- for connecting to the microphone socket of the PC sound card.
黑色耳机插头{\f2 (n) - }用于连接{\f2 PC }声卡上的麦克风插孔。
Digital microphone
数字麦克风
Change background
更换背景
Or:
或者：
For manually adjusting the focus of the lens.
用于手动调节镜头焦距。
Clamp with rubber rims / camera foot
带橡胶镶边的固定夹{\f2 /}摄像头底座
For attaching the WebCam to your (flat panel) PC monitor or laptop screen.
用于将网络摄像头固定到{\f2 PC }平板显示器或笔记本电脑的屏幕上。
The clamp can be folded when the WebCam is placed on a desk or (large) desktop monitor.
将网络摄像头放置于桌面或（大型）台式显示器上时，固定夹可收合。
For adding voice and sound when video calling and video recording.
可在进行视频通话和视频录制时，添加语音或声音。
Lights up {\cf6 blue} when the WebCam is in use.
网络摄像头正在使用时，{\f2 LED }会亮起{\cf6 蓝}灯。

VLounge
VLounge
Motion detection
动作捕捉
Broadcasting your videos over the Internet
在互联网上发布您的视频
Via VLounge you have access to all camera-related software.
通过{\f5 Vlounge}，您可以访问与摄像头相关的所有软件。
See ‘Operating the WebCam’.
请参阅“网络摄像头的操作”。
(SPC525NC only)
（仅{\f5 SPC525NC}）
• Connect the black headphone plug (n) to the headphone socket of the PC sound card.
•{\f2 }将黑色耳机插头{\f2 (n) }连接至{\f2 PC }声卡上的耳机插孔。
• Connect the grey microphone plug (!) to the microphone orgreen socket of the sound card.
•{\f2 }将灰色麦克风插头 {\f5 (!)} 连接至声卡上的麦克风插孔或绿色插孔。
by clicking the VProperty icon █ in the Windows taskbar, bottom right of your screen;
单击画面右下角{\f5 Windows }任务栏上的{\f5 VProperty }图标{\f5 █}；
by selecting ‘PC Camera Settings’ under ‘Preferences’ in the VLounge selection screen;
在{\f5 Vlounge }选择画面的“首选项”{\f5 (Preferences) }选项卡下，选择“{\f5 PC }摄像头设置”{\f5 (PC Camera Settings)}；
by clicking the █ icon in the VLounge selection screen.
在{\f5 Vlounge }画面中单击{\f5 █ }图标。
Shutter speed
快门速度
The shutter speed determines how long the camera shutter remains open as a picture is taken.
快门速度决定摄像头的快门在拍照时打开的时间。
The slower the shutter speed, the longer the exposure time.
快门速度越慢，曝光时间越长。
The shutter speed controls the total amount of light reaching the sensor.
快门速度控制到达传感器的光线总量。
Use the slider to set the desired shutter speed.
使用滑块设置理想的快门速度。
Gain
增益
In video, gain is the amount of white in a video picture.
在视频中，增益是指视频图片的白光量。
Use the slider to set the desired gain level.
使用滑块设置理想的增益值。
This slider provides manual control over the microphone.
此滑块可用于手工调节麦克风的音量。
Face tracking
面部跟踪
If you enable the face tracking option the WebCam will track your face.
如果启用了面部跟踪选项，网络摄像头将跟踪您的面部。
This will give your more convenience while video chatting, because you don’t need to sit still during your video conversation.
这样将使视频聊天更加方便，因为您在进行视频对话时无需安静地坐着。
Digital zoom
数字变焦
Use the digital zoom option to get an object closer.
使用数字变焦选项可以将镜头拉近。
Digital zoom magnifies the pixels but not the actual image.
数字变焦功能可以放大图像的像素，但不改变实际图像。
It degrades image quality.
图像的质量将下降。
Use the slider to set the desired volume level.
使用滑块设置理想的音量。
All applications can be accessed via the Philips V(ideo)-Lounge application.
通过{\f5 Philips V(ideo)-Lounge }应用程序，可以访问所有的应用程序。
VLounge is the central application for easy access to your Philips WebCam.
{\f5 VLounge }是访问{\f5 Philips }网络摄像头的核心应用程序。
Start VLounge:
启动{\f5 Vlounge}：
through the Windows QuickLaunch menu in your taskbar;
通过任务栏中的{\f2 Windows }快速启动菜单；
via the program group ‘SPC520NC WebCam’;
通过“{\f5 SPC520NC }网络摄像头”程序组；
by clicking the VLounge icon on the desktop.
单击桌面上的{\f5 VLounge }图标。
The VLounge application will now be initiated and the Vlounge selection screen appears.
{\f5 VLounge }应用程序即将启动，{\f5 Vlounge }选择画面出现。
When more than one WebCam is installed and connected to your PC / laptop, you can select the WebCam you wish to operate.
如果您的{\f5 PC/}笔记本电脑安装并连接了一个以上网络摄像头，您可以从中选择您想使用的。
1 Open the ‘Preferences’ menu.
{\f5 1 }打开“首选项”{\f5 (Preferences) }菜单。
Select ‘Video Device’.
选择“视频设备”{\f5 (Video Device)}。
All WebCams connected are shown.
连接的所有网络摄像头显示出来。
Select the WebCam you wish to operate.
选择您想要使用的网络摄像头。
Click the ‘OK’ button.
The VLoungeselection screen for the selected WebCam appears.
显示所选网络摄像头的{\f5 Vlounge }选择画面出现。
In the ‘Capture’ menu you can capture images and make video recordings and transfer, preview, edit, e-mail, print and organise your photos and video recordings.
在“抓拍”{\f5 (Capture) }菜单中，您可以抓拍图像和录制视频，并对照片和视频进行传输、预览、编辑、电子邮件发送、打印和整理操作。
Click the ‘Capture’ tab to open the Capture menu.
单击“抓拍”{\f5 (Capture) }选项卡打开“抓拍”{\f5 (Capture) }菜单。
> The camera starts operating immediately.
{\f5 > }摄像头立即开始工作。
Click ‘IMAGE’ to capture an image.
单击“图像”{\f5 (IMAGE) }抓拍图像。
Click ‘VIDEO’ to start a video recording.
单击“视频”{\f5 (VIDEO) }开始录制视频。
Click ‘VIDEO’ again to stop recording.
再次单击“视频”{\f5 (VIDEO) }停止录制。
Click █ to maximize the lower part of the screen and display the camera preview.
单击{\f5 █ }最大化画面的下部，并显示摄像预览。
Click █ to maximize the upper part of the screen and display your captured images and video recordings.
单击{\f5 █ }最大化画面的上部，并显示您拍摄的图像和录制的视频。
Move your cursor onto a button to see a brief explanation of the button function.
将光标移至按钮，显示相应按钮功能的简介。
If you need assistance select ‘Application Help’ in the ‘Help’ menu.
如果需要帮助，请在“帮助”{\f5 (Help) }菜单中选择“应用程序帮助”{\f5 (Application Help)}。
Click the ‘Communicate’ tab to open the Communicate menu.
单击“通讯”{\f5 (Communicate) }选项卡打开“通讯”{\f5 (Communicate) }菜单。
> The available applications are shown by their icons.
{\f5 > }可用应用程序的图标显示出来。
Click the appropriate ‘Install’ button to download and install an application.
单击相应的“安装”{\f5 (Install) }按钮，下载并安装应用程序。
Follow the on-screen instructions during downloading and installing.
按照屏幕显示的说明下载和安装软件。
After installing an application, make the required WebCam settings within the application in order to be able to properly use the WebCam via the application.
安装了应用程序后，为了能够正确地通过应用程序使用网络摄像头，应在应用程序中进行必要的网络摄像头设置。
Click the appropriate ‘Launch’ button to start an application.
单击相应的“运行”{\f5 (Launch) }按钮启动应用程序。
Digital built-in
数字内置
Multimedia headset supplied (SPC525NC)
多媒体耳机随附{\f5 (SPC525NC)}
•Microsoft® Windows® XP or Vista;
•{\f5 Microsoft® Windows® XP }或{\f5 Vista}；
If the ‘Language selection’ screen does not appear automatically, open ‘My computer’, double click on the CD, then double click on the 'Setup.exe' icon.
{\i 如果未自动显示“语言选择”}{\f2 (}{\i\f2 Language selection}{\f2 )}{\i 画面，请打开“我的电脑”，双击}{\i\f2 CD }{\i 光盘，然后双击“}{\i\f2 Set-up.exe}{\i ”图标。}
All required items are selected by default.
默认状态下所有必要项都已选中。
Select at least ‘SPC620NCWebCam Driver’ and ‘Philips VLounge’.
至少应选择“{\f2 SPC620NC }网络摄像头驱动程序”{\f2 (SPC620NCWebCam Driver) }和“{\f2 Philips VLounge}”。
> The following screen appears.
{\f2 > }出现以下画面。
Select ‘{\b Yes}’, then click ‘{\b Finish}’ to restart your PC / laptop.
选择{\b “是”}{\b\f2 (Yes)}，然后单击“{\b 完成}”{\b\f2 (Finish) }重新启动您的{\f2 PC /}笔记本电脑。
Use the clamp and the two rubber rims to attach the WebCam to your (flat panel) PC monitor or laptop screen.
利用固定夹和两个橡胶镶边将网络摄像头固定到{\f2 PC }平板显示器或笔记本电脑的屏幕上。
•{\b }Fold the clamp to place the WebCam on a desk or (large) desktop monitor.
•{\b\f2 }收合固定夹后，可将网络摄像头放置于桌面或（大型）台式显示器上。
If you enable the face tracking option, the WebCam will track your face.
如果启用了面部跟踪选项，网络摄像头将会跟踪您的面部。
This gives {\cf6 you} more convenience while video chatting, because you don’t need to sit still during your video conversation.
这样将使{\cf6 视频聊天}更加方便，因为您在进行视频对话时不必一动不动地坐着。
18 {\b Audio enhancement}
{\f2 18 }音频增强
This option helps you to enhance the audio quality of the WebCam in order to achieve optimal voice quality when video calling.
该选项可帮助增强网络摄像头的音频质量，以便在视频通话时获得最佳音质。
Use the slider to adjust audio quality to your own personal preference.
使用滑块，根据您的个人喜好调节音频质量。
2 digital built-in omni directional microphones
{\f2 2 }个内置全向数字麦克风
Select ‘Demo mode’ to see a 'live preview' video image on your monitor so you can see the effect of the adjustment on your screen.
选择“演示模式”{\f2 (Demo mode) }在显示器上观看“实时预览”{\f2 (live preview) }视频图像，您可以在屏幕上观看调节效果。
helps you to enhance the image and video quality of the WebCam, giving you ultimate sharpness, vivid colors and smooth, natural motion.
可帮助增强网络摄像头的图像和视频质量，还您以终极的色彩锐度、逼真的色彩和流畅自然的动作。
Use the slider to adjust the level of Pixel Plus, added to the live video of your WebCam.
使用滑块调节 {\f2 Pixel Plus }的水平，以提高网络摄像头的实时视频质量。
Demo mode
演示模式
This option enables you to replace the actual (real-time) background image by one from the WebCam background list or by one of your own pictures.
通过此选项，您可以使用网络摄像头背景列表中的图像或您自己的图片来更换实际（实时）背景图像。
Note:
注：
When changing the background, make sure that:
更改背景时，请确保：
- the actual background is static.
— 实际背景处于静态状态；
There should be no movement within the WebCam field of view.
网络摄像头的视角范围内没有活动。
Not even the movement of a curtain.
窗帘的晃动都不允许。
- there is sufficient light in the room.
— 室内光线充足；
The better the lighting conditions, the better the performance of the ‘Change background’ feature.
光线条件越佳，“更改背景”功能的效果越好。
- lighting conditions are not changed.
— 光线条件应保持不变；
Even a slight change in the lighting conditions will negatively influence the image.
光线条件即使出现细微变化也会影响图像的质量。
- the colors of the cloths you wear are not the same as the background color.
— 您穿着的衣服颜色与背景颜色不同；
- the WebCam does not move, even the slightest movement will negatively influence the image.
— 网络摄像头没有移动；即使是轻微的移动也会影响图像质量。
To change the background:
要更改背景：
In the ‘{\b Features}’ menu, check the ‘{\b Change background}’ box.
在“{\b 功能}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Features}{\f2 ) }菜单中，勾选“{\b 更改背景}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Change background}{\f2 ) }复选框。
> The last selected background is shown in the preview window.
{\f2 > }最后选择的背景会显示在预览窗口中。
> When the option is enabled for the first time, the first image from the WebCam background list is selected.
{\f2 > }首次启用该选项时，默认选中的是网络摄像头背景列表中的首张图像。
Use ▼ to browse through the WebCam background list and select a background.
点击{\f2 ▼ }来浏览网络摄像头背景列表，并选择一个背景。
Use ‘{\b Browse}’ to browse through your harddisk content and select one of your own pictures as background.
点击“{\b 浏览}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Browse}{\f2 ) }按钮来浏览硬盘内容，并选择一张自己的图片作为背景。
Make sure the background is properly lit and that there is no movement within the WebCam field of view, then click ‘{\b Take picture}’ and step out of the WebCam field of view.
确保背景光线充足并且网络摄像头的视角范围内没有活动，然后单击“{\b 拍照}”({\b\f2 Take picture})，并走出网络摄像头的视角范围。
> Three seconds are now counted down and a picture of the actual background is taken.You will here a shutter sound.
{\f2 > }三秒计时后便会拍下一幅实际背景图片，并且您将会听到咔嚓一声。
> The actual background is now replaced by the selected background.
{\f2 > }此时实际背景便会被所选背景替代。
Add logo
添加徽标
If you enable this option, a logo image will be placed in one of the corners of the Video stream.
启用此选项时，视频流的一个角落会出现徽标图像。
By default, the last used logo will be selected when the option is enabled.
默认状态下，启用此选项时选中的是上次使用的徽标。
When the option is enabled for the first time, the Philips logo will be selected and shown in the upper right corner of the screen.
首次启用该选项时，默认选中的是 {\f2 Philips }徽标，并且该徽标将显示在画面右上角。
Select the desired corner for the logo to be placed in by checking the corresponding box in the ‘Add logo’ screen.
在“添加徽标”{\f2 (Add logo) }画面中勾选相应的复选框，以选择要将徽标放在哪个角上。
Use ▼ to browse through the WebCam logo list to select a logo.
使用{\f2 ▼ }来浏览网络摄像头徽标列表，以选择一个徽标。
Browse
浏览
Browse through your harddisk content to select one of your own logos.
浏览硬盘内容，以选择一个自己的徽标。
Logo size
徽标大小
Use the slider to set the desired logo size.
使用滑块设置理想的徽标大小。
Video frames
视频框
This option enables you to place an overlay (frame) over the current video stream.
通过此选项，您可在当前视频流上设置一个视频框。
By default, the last used frame will be used, when the option is enabled.
默认状态下，启用该选项时将使用上次使用的视频框。
Use ▼ to browse through the WebCam frame list to select a frame.
使用{\f2 ▼ }来浏览网络摄像头视频框列表，并选择一个视频框。
Video effects
视频效果
This option enables you to add video effects to your video recordings and video calls.
通过此选项，您可在视频录制和视频通话时添加视频效果。
For example, you can display the video with canvas effect, distortion effect, embossing effect and many more.
例如，您可使用油画效果、变形效果、浮雕效果或更多其他效果来显示视频。
By default, the last used effect will be applied to the video, when the option is enabled.
默认状态下，启用该选项时视频会采用上次使用的效果。
When the option is enabled for the first time, the first effect from the video effects list will be selected.
首次启用时该选项，默认选中的是视频效果列表中的第一种效果。
Use ▼ to browse through the WebCam video effects list to select an effect.
使用{\f2 ▼ }来浏览网络摄像头视频效果列表，以选择一种效果。
> The total amount of captured items is shown above the content panel (top right).
{\f2 > }抓拍项的总数会显示在内容面板的右上方（顶部）。
• Click ‘{\b All Captures}’ to display all captured items in the content panel.
•{\f2 }单击“{\b 所有抓拍}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 All Captures}{\f2 )}，以在内容面板中显示所有抓拍项。
• Click ‘{\b Images}’, ‘{\b Videos}’ or ‘{\b Folders}’ to display your captured images, video clips or folders containg captures in the content panel.
•{\f2 }单击“{\b 图像}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Images}{\f2 )}、“{\b 视频}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Videos}{\f2 ) }或“{\b 文件夹}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Folders}{\f2 )}，可在内容面板中显示您所抓拍的图像、视频短片或包含抓拍项的文件夹。
Deleting captured items
删除抓拍项
{\b 1 }Select the items you wish to delete in the content panel or under ‘Images’, ‘Videos’ and ‘Folders’.
{\b\f2 1 }在内容面板中或在“图像”{\f2 (Images)}、“视频”{\f2 (Videos) }和“文件夹”{\f2 (Folders) }目录下选中您想删除的项。
{\b 2 }Click ‘ ’.
> The following dialogue screen appears.
{\f2 > }出现以下对话框。
Register your product and get support at www.philips.com/welcome
请在以下网址注册本产品并获取支持： {\f5 www.philips.com/welcome}
{\b 3 }Click the ‘{\b OK}’ button to delete the selected items.
{\b\f2 3 }单击“{\b 确定}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 OK}{\f2 ) }按钮，删除所选项。
3 {\b Picture enhancement}
{\f2 3 }图像增强
• If you need assistance select ‘{\b Application Help}’ in the ‘{\b Help}’ menu.
•{\f2 }如果需要帮助，请在“{\b 帮助}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Help}{\f2 ) }菜单中选择“{\b 应用程序帮助}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Application Help}{\f2 )}。
In the ‘{\b Monitor}’ menu you can set up the WebCam for motion detection and videolog recording.
在“{\b 监测}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Monitor}{\f2 ) }菜单中，您可设置网络摄像头的动作捕捉和视频记录录制功能。
• Click the ‘{\b Monitor}’ tab to open the ‘Monitor’ menu.
•{\f2 }单击“{\b 监测}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Monitor}{\f2 ) }选项卡，打开“监测”{\f2 (Monitor) }菜单。
> The Monitor menu main screen appears.
{\f2 > }出现监测菜单的主画面。
> The total amount of videologs is shown above the content panel (top right).
{\f2 > }视频记录的总数会显示在内容面板的右上方（顶部）。
> The ‘Movement’ indicator ( ) shows the amount of movement that is detected within the Webcam field of view.
{\f2 > }“动作”{\f2 (Movement) }显示条（ ）显示出在网络摄像头视角范围内所捕捉到的动作量。
• Click ‘{\b Start monitoring}’ to start monitoring.
•{\f2 }单击“{\b 开始监测}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Start monitoring}{\f2 )}，开始进行监测。
> If movement is detected within the field of view of the WebCam, recording starts automatically.
{\f2 > }如果摄像头在视角范围内捕捉到动作，录制将会自动开始。
• Click ‘{\b Start monitoring}’ again to stop monitoring.
•{\f2 }再次单击“{\b 开始监测}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Start monitoring}{\f2 ) }以停止监测。
• Click ‘{\b All logs}’ to display all available logs in the content panel.
•{\f2 }单击“{\b 所有记录}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 All logs}{\f2 ) }以在内容面板中显示所有可用记录。
• Click ‘{\b By date}’ to display the content of the various recording dates in the content panel.
•{\f2 }单击“{\b 按日期}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 By date}{\f2 ) }以在内容面板中显示不同录制日期的内容。
• Click on a date to display the log(s) made on that date in the content panel.
•{\f2 }单击某一日期，可在内容面板中显示在此日期录制的记录。
• Click ‘ ’ to maximize the lower part of the screen and display the camera preview.
单击“ ”最大化画面的下半部，并显示摄像预览。
This option enables Philips patented Pixel Plus technology and
该选项采用了{\f2 Philips }逐点晶晰{\f2 (Pixel Plus) }专利技术，
• Click ‘ ’ to maximize the upper part of the screen and display your videologs.
单击“ ”最大化画面的上部，并显示视频记录。
• Move your cursor onto a button to see a brief explanation of the button function.
•{\f2 }将光标移至按钮，显示相应按钮功能的简介。
To fully benefit from the support that Philips offers, register your product at www.philips.com/welcome.
为能充分利用{\f5 Philips }提供的支持，请在以下网址注册本产品：{\f5 www.philips.com/welcome}。
Your WebCam
您的网络摄像头
The lower part of the screen will be split in two halfs; on the left you see the current picture, on the right you see the enhanced picture.
屏幕下半部分将分为两个图像窗口，左边显示为当前图像，右边显示为增强后的图像。
Monitor settings
监测设置
•{\b }Click ‘ ’ to access the ‘Monitor settings’ menu.
•{\b\f2 }单击“ ”进入“监测设置”{\f2 (Monitor settings) }菜单。
•{\b }Enter the minimum memory capacity you wish to remain on your harddisk during recording.
•{\b\f2 }输入录制时希望硬盘留有的最小空间大小。
> Recording stops automatically when harddisk space comes below the set amount of Mbs.
{\f2 > }当硬盘空间小于所设大小时，录制将自动停止。
•{\b }Check the ‘Notification’ box if you wish a notification to be send to an e-mail address when movement is detected.
•{\b\f2 }如果您希望向某一电子邮件地址发送动作捕捉通知，请勾选“通知”{\f2 (Notification) }复选框。
•{\b }Enter the e-mail address you wish the notification to be sent to.
•{\b\f2 }输入希望收到通知的电子邮件地址。
•{\b }Use the ‘{\b Browse}’ button to select an audio file if you wish an audio file to start playing as soon as movement is detected.
•{\b\f2 }如果您希望在捕捉到动作时立即开始播放音频文件，请单击“{\b 浏览}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Browse}{\f2 ) }按钮，选择音频文件。

•{\b }Use the sensitivity slider to set the desired sensitivity level for the WebCam detector.The sensitivity level determines the minimum amount of movement that will cause the WebCam to start recording.
•{\b\f2 }使用灵敏度滑块设置理想的网络摄像头探测器的灵敏度。灵敏度决定了促使网络摄像头开始录像的最小动作量。
Congratulations on your purchase and welcome to Philips!
感谢您购买并欢迎访问{\f5 Philips }网站！
The higher the sensitivity level, the sooner recording starts.
灵敏度越高，录制便会越快开始。
•{\b }Click the ‘{\b OK}’ button to store your settings and close the dialogue box or click ‘ ’ or the ‘{\b Cancel}’ button to close the dialogue box without saving any settings.
•{\b\f2 }{\b 单击“确定”}{\b\f2 (OK) }{\b 按钮保存您的设置并关闭对话框，也可以单击“} {\b ”或“取消”}{\b\f2 (Cancel) }{\b 按钮关闭对话框而不保存设置。}
Deleting videologs
删除录像记录
{\b 1 }Select the logs you wish to delete in the content panel or under ‘By date’.
{\b\f2 1 }在内容面板中或在“按日期”{\f2 (By date) }目录下选中您想删除的记录。
{\b 3 }Click the ‘{\b OK}’ button to delete the selected videologs.
{\b\f2 3 }单击“{\b 确定}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 OK}{\f2 ) }按钮，删除所选视频记录。
In the ‘{\b Broadcast}’ menu you can select a website where you can broadcast your videos live.
在“{\b 发布}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Broadcast}{\f2 ) }菜单中，您可以选择要发布实时视频的网站。
Volume level wizard
音量设置向导
Microphone volume
麦克风音量
• Click the ‘{\b Broadcast}’ tab to open the ‘Broadcast’ menu.
•{\f2 }单击“{\b 发布}”{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Broadcast}{\f2 ) }选项卡以打开“发布”{\f2 (Broadcast) }菜单。
Helps you set up the microphone volume level.
可帮助您设置麦克风的音量大小。
• Select the desired website by clicking the corresponding ‘{\b Launch}’ button.
•{\f2 }单击相应的“{\b 开始}”‘{\f2 (}{\b\f2 Launch}{\f2 ) }按钮，选择需要的网站。
• Test the microphone volume level by clicking the 'Start' button.
• 单击“开始”（{\f5 Start}）按钮，测试麦克风的音量大小。
• Follow the on-screen instructions for live broadcasting of your videos on the selected website.
•{\f2 }按照屏幕上显示的说明，在所选网站上实时发布您的视频。
